entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0 MAUI App has exited with code 2147943792 (0x80070570) #99465
  • [mono] Missing box optimizations in the interpreter #99463
  • System.Type.GUID is empty on Android #99459
  • OSX PR build artifacts are missing symbols #99456
  • 使用海康sdk的时候需要加载 libcrypto.so.1.1 libssl.so.1.1 提示加载失败 #99455
  • [API Proposal]: Add PeekByte() to BufferedStream #99454
  • AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() crashes with NullReferenceException #99452
  • [API Proposal]: BinarySearch on SortedList<TKey, TValue> #99448
  • System.Security.Policy.Evidence missing in .NET Platform Extensions for .net framework #99447
    9.0.0
  • Flush(true) does not call fsync on first attempt #99445
  • System.Text.Json Serialize when ignoring cycles produces undesired json #99444

Closed

  • ILCompiler doesn't resolve type names for attributes on fields/properties #92259
  • NRE in encoders #89931
    9.0.0
  • Add PeekByte() to BufferedStream #99450
  • [API Proposal]: Add a simple option to inject the default/system TimeProvider. #96717
  • [jitstressregs] Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling fails #99414
    9.0.0
  • Wasm SignalRClientTests timing out #99268
  • System.Data.Odbc bug for connect IRISDB through odbc for unixodbc #80015
  • [MONO][Interp][Wasm] RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #99398

PullRequests

Created

  • `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic attributes #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Evidence types to AcccessControl NETFramework Facade #99462
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99461
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Ensure edge likelihoods 3 #99460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BS_1A, BT_1A #99458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Reenable test on s390x in tests.proj #99453
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Trying to avoid AV while reading a invalid MethodTable #99451
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • [browser][wbt] Extend delay when waiting for URLs #99446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Share EventSource QCall definitions between NAOT and CoreCLR #99441
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Make Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite obsolete #99382
    area-System.Threading
  • Add Dictionary<T, List<T>>.AddToList #99434
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][jit] Emit instances when using unmanaged generic calli in gsha… #99381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use the right owning module in type string resolution #99429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][browser] Fix failures in `CalendarTestBase` affecting several globalization tests #99407
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.4
  • Fix GCStress disabling of ParallelCrashTester #99412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workload-testing] Misc improvements #99392
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Fix Promise cancelation #99397
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CC,CD #99284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix tiny regression in Enumerable.ElementAt #99437
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Reduce overheads of enumerating Grouping from Enumerable.GroupBy #99365
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Use sentinel arg to clear error register pre-Swift call #99428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused System.Runtime.Versioning.CompatibilitySwitch #99270
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [RISC-V] Enable crossgen for corelib #99436
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Disallow parameters passed in float regs from being enregistered in int regs #99286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] win-x86: Calling conventions #99430
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix InlineArray and some other corner cases in Swift lowering #99337
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use alias for Tizen and RISCV owners #99435
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi…" #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][mt] Disable hybrid globalization for multithreaded runtime #99360
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • [mono] Enable 'compile-in-child' aot mode on ios. #99390
    area-Build-mono
  • [6.0] Fix usage of recycled lists in the thread pool #99387
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.29
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `--create-manifest-if-needed` should be mentioned if no manifest exists #39329
  • NullReferenceException in Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.ProjectContext after broken restore #39316

Closed

  • Add a template for the Directory.Packages.props file #39341
  • When run a dotnet background service as a unix service is always show "Error: No space left on device" #33899
  • dotnet build and workload stops working after updating, Roslyn: Unhandled Exception: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary #39033

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Add -pr version of pipeline #39324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enhance base image inference for trimmed applications - use -extras when globalization is in use #39317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [main] Add -pr version of pipeline #39322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary RemoveMSDiaTypeLib target from GenerateLayout.targets #39304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry pick extensions fix #39306
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update TestAsTool builds to use 1ES pools #39308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `this` keyword for extension method not recommended in partial declaration of static class without `static` modifier #72468
  • [InlineArray] on a ref struct reports CS0306 as error, but CS9184 as a warning #72467
  • Incorrect indentation of list pattern cases in switch expressions #72465
  • Code cleanup "Apply conditional expression preferences" - in latest VS version #72464
  • File scoped namespaces should (arguably) be the default in VS code style settings for new users #72463
  • Custom `IEnumarable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` + Collection Initalizer causes `csc.exe` to crash #72461
  • Collection Initializer cannot handle Extensions akin to `IEnumerable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` ( `IDE0028` vs `CS0029`) #72460
  • Extensions with constrained generic types are not recommended when invoked on a generic method parameter #72457
    Backlog
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72456
  • [Feature Request] Report build times for referenced projects during build #72455
  • Editor config options not populated correctly when project build path includes a symlink? #72453
  • Semantic Snippets Completion #72452
  • Semantic Snippets - Route snippet command handler to new semantic snippets #72451
  • Re-consider usage of ProjectSystemProject._gate #72450

Closed

  • CS8600 after linq Where to filter non null values. #39586
    Backlog
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72378
  • Add `ArgumentKind.ParamCollection` #72222
  • Select clause sometimes copies range variable to local in generated method #72417

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run _CopyPackagesToInsert on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation and Add method with params array #72469
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • DefiniteAssignment: allow unconverted object creation expressions within bad expressions #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce closure allocations associated with AsyncLazy usage #72449
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Standardize our Powershell code #72423
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure obsolete diagnostics about required constructor or Add method is suppressible. #72426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cap signing file size to avoid OOMs #72432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused diagnostic methods #72445
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move Linux to building Roslyn.sln #72438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow testing official builds on any branch #72433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Add server interactivity benchmarks #54452
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add Data Protection Metrics #54451
  • Add new IHealthChecksBuilder extension method. #54449
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54447
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation do not work with .net8 or recent version of visual studio #54445
  • .net 8 Blazor WASM project AOT fails #54443
  • Issue when adding Blazor (server) to existing MVC app in .NET 8 #54438
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo throws exception when navigating in OnInitialized #54436
  • Installer of aspnetcore still contains wrong outdated .NET dotnet license information that makes it problematic to distribute #54434
  • Missleading unhandled exception error log #54433
  • Blazor SSR: Partially invalid UI Refresh after submitting EditForm #54432
  • Blazor InputSelect with multiple enabled throws NullRefException if nothing is selected #54431
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54430
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #54429
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes, mvc #54428
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plainTextSansFilter #54427
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #54426
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54425
  • Improve observability of Microsoft.IdentityModel logs #54424
  • Cannot trigger blazor events with elements #54423

Closed

  • PlatformNotSupportedException when navigating from Counter to Home page with multithreading enabled #54317
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, single_query #54402
  • Perf improvement: https #54408
  • IRazorViewEngine render view to html string, javascript tag is stripped out #53259
  • In the Blazor 8.0 project, using the RenderMode.InteractiveServer mode on both the HeadOutlet and Routes components caused occasional Javascript crashes. #54249

PullRequests

Created

  • Un-retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #54450
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54448
    area-blazor
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • [release/6.0] Create ci-public.yml #54442
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Create ci-public.yml #54441
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Create ci-public.yml #54440
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Create ci-public.yml #54439
    area-infrastructure
  • backport 8.0 - http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54437
    Servicing-consider, feature-httpsys

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `e1a38bc` #54435
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Enable publishing in VMR #54422
    area-infrastructure
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking
  • Fallback to `IActivator.CreateInstance<IXmlDecryptor>` when `Type.GetType` fails #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WordWrap doesn't wrap on a Label in a Grid if the ColumnDefinition is set to Auto. #21110
  • [Android] MAUI 8.0.3 -> 8.0.6 regression: custom handler with key listener no longer works #21109
  • dotnet workload install maui fails because Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui.Msi.x64 version 8.0.7 doesn't exist #21108
  • OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast() iOS/MacCatalyst mismatch makes it impossible to guard some features #21106
  • iOS: Flyout Menu Backdrop Area does not Readjust on Orientation Change #21105
  • Using synchronization primitives within a Draw callback causes a crash in the .NET runtime on Windows #21104
  • Border has an almost animated resizing effect when first loaded. (IOS) #21103
  • Switching from .net7.0-android to .net8.0-android causes 'missing java symbols errors' in runtime inside a .net8.0-android MAUI app #21102
  • MacCatalyst - Tabbing behaviour on a scrollable page of controls is inconsistent #21101
  • MAUI Shell Flyout unwanted click through behavior #21097
  • Maui-8.0.10-preview.10282 Fails AzureDevops looking for system runtime 9.00 #21096
  • [Maps] [Android] [Regression] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #21094
  • iOS scaling differently than Android #21093
  • Building MAUI projects with certain Unicode characters in the name result in failure to find Android and Windows manifests #21091

Closed

  • I need to create image and I need to put on top of it button and label any ideas? #21086
  • SearchBar crashes on iOS 17.4 #21085
  • [regression/8.0.3] BlazorWebView does not initialize properly on Android platform #19013
  • Expander is not working in ios inside collectionview #20004

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update Sdk and installer #21107
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [testing] Cleaning up TemplateTests iOS simulator issues #20817
    area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in `GestureRecognizers` #21089
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨

entry.content:
Issues
